reviews.review: love the game. go for it.
used to play cs 1.6, now play csgo, once a CS fan always CS fan
Still a my favorite game ever

Would highly recommend this game to anyone prepared to lose thousand of hours of their teenage years and perhaps hundreds of dollars on cosmetic items. Very satisfying shooting and movement mechanics which might spoil your taste for other first person shooters especially single player story driven games.
Muy buen juego para mi gusto! <3 :)
